metadata.name: AuroraPiggy
metadata.description:
此卡用以纪念 WePiggy 跨链部署计划的第十步：登陆 Aurora。穿越彩虹之桥，纵享极光之 DeFi。持有此卡可获得由 WePiggy 加持的“穿越极光，追梦不凡”状态。This card is issued to commemorate the 10th step of WePiggy's cross-chain deployment plan: Aurora. Cross the Rainbow Bridge and enjoy the DeFi of Aurora. Holder of this NFT will be blessed by WePiggy with the buff of "Crossing Aurora, Dream It Possible".
总量(Amount)：98 
品级(Level)：史诗(Epic)
